thread.title: 19 Questions I Have About "Aladdin" Now That I'm An Adult
thread.title_full: 19 Questions I Have About "Aladdin" Now That I'm An Adult

author: Jenna Guillaume
title: 19 Questions I Have About "Aladdin" Now That I'm An Adult
text:
ID: 10469661 2. Um, this movie is actually a bit problematic, hey? View this image ›
Disney ID: 10469626 3. Did Aladdin make Abu’s lil’ outfit for him? View this image ›
Disney ID: 10469675 4. Wait, is this really a brothel?! View this image ›
bradofarrell.tumblr.com / Via knowyourmeme.com ID: 10469683 5. Why is this douche prince’s underwear in tact when Rajah clearly has a piece of it in his mouth? View this image ›
Disney / Via moviemistakes.com ID: 10469708 6. What happened to Jasmine’s mother? View this image ›
Disney And Aladdin’s parents?
ID: 10469749 7. Why do some characters have British accents, and some have American? View this image ›
Disney ID: 10469756 8. Why aren’t there any guards actually guarding the palace? Disney
Disney
 It’s so easy for Jasmine to get out? And for Prince Ali to get IN?!
ID: 10469781 9. In fact, where are all the servants? Are Jasmine, Jafar, and the sultan literally the only people who live in the palace? View this image ›
Disney You never see anyone else?!
ID: 10469785 10. How does Aladdin break open the melon with his bare hands/knee? View this image ›
Disney It’s pretty impressive tbh.
ID: 10469794 11. Why is the Cave of Wonders so damn picky about who gets to enter him and touch his forbidden treasure? View this image ›
Disney ID: 10469884 12. If they can’t touch anything but the lamp, how come nothing happens when they touch the magic carpet? View this image ›
Disney ID: 10469900 13. WHERE DOES APU PULL THE LAMP FROM?! View this image ›
Disney ID: 10469904 14. Why doesn’t Jafar hypnotise anyone other than the sultan? View this image ›
Disney Couldn’t he have gotten literally everything he wanted just by hypnotising Jasmine and Aladdin?
ID: 10469964 15. Why don’t Jasmine and Jafar immediately recognise Aladdin as Ali? He doesn’t even have his face covered?! Disney
Disney
 Literally the same person.
ID: 10469936 16. Does the magic of the carpet include enabling them to stay on/survive at those heights/not get wind-burn? View this image ›
Disney ID: 10469945 17. HOW DID ANYONE SURVIVE THIS?! View this image ›
Disney ID: 10469959 18. What did all the ordinary people think of the drastic changes at the palace? View this image ›
Disney Were their memories altered or did they realise they had a new, evil sultan for, like, five hours?
ID: 10469960 19. Aladdin and Jasmine knew each other for what, two days? THAT IS SO FAST TO FALL IN LOVE. View this image ›
Disney / Via Meme Center (I still ship it.)
ID: 10469952 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com!
Jenna Guillaume is Editor-at-Large for BuzzFeed and is based in Sydney.
